hero.tagline: Professional Footballer | Indonesia Women's National Team | Warbeyen Frauen

about.title: About Isa
about.text: Isa Warps is a Dutch-Indonesian professional footballer who combines her passion for the game with representing two cultures at the highest level. As a player for VfR Warbeyen Frauen in the German 2. Bundesliga and an international for Timnas Putri Indonesia, she is building an inspiring career on the international stage.

cta.title: Interested in sponsorship?
cta.subtitle: Discover the possibilities for a collaboration with Isa Warps

hero.title: About Isa
hero.subtitle: From Eindhoven to the international stage

biography.title: My Story
biography.content:
Born and raised in the Netherlands with Indonesian roots, Isa Warps has turned her passion for football into a professional career spanning two continents. From her first steps on the pitch at DBS Eindhoven at a young age, she knew that football would shape her life.

After years of development at Dutch clubs such as FC Eindhoven and RKSV Nuenen, Isa made the move to the international stage. At KRC Genk Ladies in Belgium and NAC Breda in the Eredivisie Vrouwen, she refined her skills and developed into a versatile attacker.

In 2023, a dream came true when she was selected for Timnas Putri Indonesia, the Indonesia Women's National Team. With 6 international caps and her first international goal to her name, she proudly represents her Indonesian heritage on the world stage.

Since 2025, Isa has been playing for VfR Warbeyen Frauen in the German 2. Bundesliga, where she tests herself daily against top-level players. Her pace, technique and shooting ability make her a dangerous attacker who can play across multiple positions.

Beyond her career on the pitch, Isa is committed to the development of women's football, particularly in Indonesia. She believes that sport has the power to inspire young women and create opportunities.
